definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

sentences.english: The influence of the characteristics of diazo master on the copy process were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了重氮母片的特性對重氮複印的影響。

sentences.english: His final breakthrough came when he obtained a copy of a manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 賈維斯最終在一份手稿上的複印件上找到了突破口。

sentences.english: The company describes its process as a 'human photocopier'.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司將其描述爲人類的複印機。

sentences.english: She found Ned alone in the photocopy room, duplicating some articles.
sentences.chinese: 她發現內德一個人在複印室裏複印一些文章。

sentences.english: She found Ned alone in the photocopy room, duplicating some articles.
sentences.chinese: 她發現內德一個人在複印室裏複印一些文章。

sentences.english: We cannot accept copies of online credit card statements.
sentences.chinese: 我們不接受在線信用卡賬戶電子結單的複印件。

sentences.english: These obligations apply mutatis mutandis to copies and duplicates.
sentences.chinese: 本義務業經必要的修改同樣適用於複印件和副本。

sentences.english: Certificate of foreign language proficiency-original and one copy.
sentences.chinese: 外語水平證明原件及複印件。

sentences.english: The categories of the lubricated duplicators are intricate.
sentences.chinese: 那些潤滑過的複印機的種類錯綜複雜。

sentences.english: Copy of Residence record, personal ID and passport.
sentences.chinese: 戶口薄和身份證複印件及護照。

sentences.english: Press this button to start copying.
sentences.chinese: 按下此鍵可開始複印工作。

sentences.english: What abut operating the fax and duplicators？
sentences.chinese: 你會發傳真和使用複印機嗎？

sentences.english: ensuring that the photocopies and documents you provide are clear and legible, and
sentences.chinese: 出具的複印件和文件字跡清晰可識。

sentences.english: Thank you for your letter of October 10 for business copiers.
sentences.chinese: 感激貴圓10月10日閉於商用複印機的詢函。

definition: to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)/to sign off on sth
to stick/to affix/to adhere/to paste (as in "copy and paste")/Taiwan pr. [nian2 tie1]/also written 黏貼|黏贴[nian2 tie1]
